import "./App.css"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import BookShelveElement from "./components/BookShelveElement"; import BookShelve from "./components/BookShelve"; import * as BooksAPI from "./apis/BooksAPI"; const App = () => { const [showSearchPage, setShowSearchpage] = useState(false); const [books, setBooks] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { const getBooks = async () => { const res = await BooksAPI.getAll(); setBooks(res) }; getBooks(); }, []); return (

{books}

{showSearchPage ? (
setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)} > Close
    ) : (

    MyReads

    Want to Read

    Read

    setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)}>Add a book
    )}
    ); } export default App;
